messages.title: Bringing real life back to politics
messages.content: Tony Hill has a long record of public service in our community having been Head of Furze Platt School for six years. Tony is well known locally for his work in charity fund-raising. He also works with young offenders, to help keep down crime in our area. As our local MP, Tony Hill will put local people first and will deliver real change and fairness for Maidenhead.

messages.title: Fighting for real change
messages.content: The Conservative Government is dragging the country towards a hard Brexit that will be disastrous for the future of Britain. Only the Liberal Democrats are united in opposing hard Brexit. Lib Dem Tony Hill said: This is our chance to send the Government a clear message that we do not want a hard Brexit. If you want Britain to remain in the single market there is only one option in this election - back the Liberal Democrats.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tony Hill is a passionate campaigner for the NHS and has been highly critical of the Conservative cuts currently taking place.
Tony Hill's leadership at Furze Platt school was described as 'excellent', 'clear, honest and open' by Ofsted. Tony knows what our schools need to do well for young people.
Tony Hill and the Liberal Democrats are fighting to stop hard Brexit, advocating for Britain to remain in the single market.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Conservative Government is dragging the country towards a hard Brexit. If you want Britain to remain in the single market there is only one option in this election - back the Liberal Democrats.

issues.brexitEurope: The Conservative Government is dragging the country towards a hard Brexit that will be disastrous for the future of Britain. Only the Liberal Democrats are united in opposing hard Brexit.
issues.education: Tony Hill's leadership at Furze Platt school was described as 'excellent', 'clear, honest and open' by Ofsted. Tony knows what our schools need to do well for young people.
issues.health: Tony Hill is a passionate campaigner for the NHS and has been highly critical of the Conservative cuts currently taking place.
issues.immigration: Tony Hill says: 'Maidenhead hero Nicholas Winton would have been horrified by Theresa May’s plans to shut the refugee scheme.'
issues.lawCrime: Tony Hill is well known locally for his work in charity fund-raising. He also works with young offenders, to help keep down crime in our area.

community.content: Tony Hill will fight Conservative plans to build on our Green Belt. They are not delivering infrastructure, upgrade of roads, policing and NHS services that are needed, making no real attempt to build affordable homes for rent/buy.
